solution_line_template: The total number of songs downloaded is {morning_songs} songs + {afternoon_songs} songs + {night_songs} songs = <<{morning_songs}+{afternoon_songs}+{night_songs}={total_songs}>>{total_songs} songs
The total size of the songs is {total_songs} songs x {size_per_song}MB/song = <<{total_songs}*{size_per_song}={total_size_mb}>>{total_size_mb} MB
